title: Landslide
description: Love and trust don’t always go hand in hand. Michelle and Rachel live happily together in the foothills of Colorado. Rachel has never had any reason to doubt Michelle’s fidelity, but when she hears a broadcast about signs your lover might be cheating on you, she begins to question Michelle’s long hours at the office and the mysterious phone calls she’s been receiving.Does Michelle truly love her, or has she found love in the arms of another? Rachel hopes that a romantic Valentine’s Day trip to the cozy resort town of Aspen will answer her questions and lay her fears to rest. Or will she return home with a heart damaged by an emotional landslide?
author: Diane Marina
